com.leon.hfu.vacationHomeCalculation

Class ReservableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leon.hfu.vacationHomeCalculation.ReservableObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Showable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeetingRoom, VacationHome

    public abstract class ReservableObject
extends Object
implements Showable
    Abstract class providing basic implementation on any reservable object reservable by Reservation objects. TODO: Add person count handling
    Author:
    Stefan Hahn

      • ReservableObject

        public ReservableObject(String name,
                String address,
                double basePrice,
                int maxPersons)
        Creaes a new ReservableObject objects with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of this ReservableObjects
        address - Address of this ReservableObjects
        basePrice - Base price of this ReservableObjects
        maxPersons - Maximum amount of persons in this ReservableObjects

    • Method Detail

      • addReservation

        void addReservation(Reservation newReservation)
              throws ConcurrentReservationException
        Adds a Reservation to this ReservableObjects. This method shouldn't be called manually, it is called automatically by Reservation within constructors.
        Parameters:
        newReservation - Reservation object
        Throws:
        ConcurrentReservationException - Thrown if there are concurrent reservations

      • cancelReservation

        void cancelReservation(Reservation reservation)
                 throws ReservationException
        Removes a Reservation from this ReservableObject. This method shouldn't be called manually, it is called automatically within Reservation.cancel().
        Parameters:
        reservation - Reservation object
        Throws:
        ReservationException - Thrown if the given Reservation objects isn't linked to this ReservableObject
